title: A Brief But spectacular take on centering Black leadership in climate change solutions
description: Heather McTeer Toney spent three years leading the Environmental Protection Agency for the southeastern United States. She now continues her advocacy for the environment both nationally and worldwide. She shares her Brief But Spectacular take on centering Black leadership in climate change solutions. PBS NewsHour is supported by - https://www.pbs.org/newshour/about/funders
